title: The Prisoner of Tordesillas
description: 1959. First Edition. 309 pages. Dust jacket covered in removable plastic wrapper over paper covered boards. Clean pages with mild tanning and foxing throughout, notable to endpapers. Tightly bound with faint thumb-marking throughout. Boards have light shelf-wear with corner bumping. Mild sunning to spine, which has mild crushing and wear to ends. Moderate water stains to front board. Book has forward lean. Boards are mildly warped. Unclipped jacket has moderate edgewear with chips, tears, and creasing. Notable rubbing and marking all over.
author: Lawrence Schoonover
